oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Thomas Barnett, Co. C, 21st Tenn. Inf. Rgt., CSA to his relatives
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Thomas Barnett, Co. C, 21st Tenn. Inf. Rgt. CSA, writes his "relatives" and discusses his health and the merging of two messes. He also mentions "our mess pays $8 per month for cooking & washing." The writer expresses frustration that his unit; has ammunition but no guns and expects to winter at this location and that they are building winter quarters at Union City and expects to stay "until peace is made." Barnett heard preaching recently and commented that "Parson Booth is to be our chaplain."
